title: Energy Balance & Integration
cleaned_text: About our Company Based in the beautiful city of Albuquerque, Energy Balance and Integration is a company combining technical and field experience spanning over the past 42 years. Our combined staff and resources have been providing testing and balancing services in New Mexico since 1976 and has had expanded services to Colorado, Eastern Arizona, and Western Texas. Services Test and Balance is just the beginning. Not only are we the highest certified test and balance company in the southwest, but we also provide audit reports and pressure gradient setting, fire/ life safety testing, room tightness testing, duct leakage testing, and troubleshooting of systems.
